016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.component;
017
018import java.util.List;
019
020import javax.el.ValueExpression;
021import javax.faces.component.UIComponent;
022
023import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
024import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
025
026import de.cuioss.test.generator.junit.EnableGeneratorController;
027import de.cuioss.test.jsf.junit5.JsfEnabledTestEnvironment;
028import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.contract.BeanPropertyContractImpl;
029import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.junit5.EnableGeneratorRegistry;
030import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.ConfigurationCallBackHandler;
031import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.ParameterizedInstantiator;
032import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.RuntimeProperties;
033import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.impl.BeanInstantiator;
034import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.impl.CallbackAwareInstantiator;
035import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.impl.DefaultInstantiator;
036import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.util.GeneratorRegistry;
037import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.util.PropertyHelper;
038import de.cuioss.tools.reflect.MoreReflection;
039import lombok.AccessLevel;
040import lombok.Getter;
041
042/**
043 * Base class for testing {@link UIComponent}s.
044 * <h3>Supported Contracts / Configurations</h3>
045 * <ul>
046 * <li>Handling of Property Generators using annotations, see
047 * {@link de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.generator}</li>
048 * <li>Reflection and annotation based property handling, see
049 * {@link de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.api.property}</li>
050 * </ul>
051 * <p>
052 * It acts as an {@link ConfigurationCallBackHandler}, saying after
053 * initialization and prior to testing the method {@link #configure(Object)}
054 * will be called allowing the concrete test-class to do some specific
055 * configuration e.g. calling init-methods and such.
056 * </p>
057 * <p>
058 * You can easily access pre-configured instance by calling
059 * {@link #anyComponent()}.
060 * </p>
061 *
062 * @author Oliver Wolff
063 * @param <T> identifying the type to be tested, at least an {@link UIComponent}
064 */
065@EnableGeneratorController
066@EnableGeneratorRegistry
067public abstract class AbstractComponentTest<T extends UIComponent> extends JsfEnabledTestEnvironment
068        implements ConfigurationCallBackHandler<T>, GeneratorRegistry {
069
070    @Getter
071    private Class<T> targetClass;
072
073    /**
074     * Needed {@link ParameterizedInstantiator} for creating test Objects
075     */
076    @Getter(AccessLevel.PROTECTED)
077    private ParameterizedInstantiator<T> instantiator;
078
079    private List<ComponentPropertyMetadata> filteredMetadata;
080
081    /**
082     * Initializes all contracts, properties and generator
083     */
084    @BeforeEach
085    public void initializeBaseClass() {
086        targetClass = MoreReflection.extractFirstGenericTypeArgument(getClass());
087
088        filteredMetadata = ComponentTestHelper.filterPropertyMetadata(getClass(),
089                new DefaultInstantiator<>(targetClass).newInstance());
090
091        PropertyHelper.logMessageForPropertyMetadata(filteredMetadata);
092        instantiator = new CallbackAwareInstantiator<>(new BeanInstantiator<>(
093                new DefaultInstantiator<>(getTargetClass()), new RuntimeProperties(filteredMetadata)), this);
094    }
095
096    /**
097     * Tests the individual properties directly, saying not {@link ValueExpression}s
098     */
099    @Test
100    void shouldHandleDirectProperties() {
101        new BeanPropertyContractImpl<>(getInstantiator()).assertContract();
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Tests the individual properties accessed using {@link ValueExpression}s
106     */
107    @Test
108    void shouldHandleValueExpressions() {
109        new ValueExpressionPropertyContract<>(instantiator, filteredMetadata, getFacesContext()).assertContract();
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * @return a minimal configured instance of the {@link UIComponent} with
114     *         {@link #configure(Object)} being already called. 'Minimal configured'
115     *         hereby defined as all attributes that are required are set
116     */
117    public T anyComponent() {
118        return getInstantiator().newInstanceMinimal();
119    }
120
121}
